arts.ttl: “It will be difficult” – Manchester City star admits he’s contacted Newcastle man about weekend clash
arts.sum: Manchester City goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma has admitted he’s already spoken to Sandro Tonali ahead of their meeting on Saturday. Sky Sports Italy have an interview with the Manchester City goalkeeper today. In a brief clip from that, he jokes about his relationship with the Newcastle man. arts.ttl: Tino Livramento’s Mindset Revealed Amid Man City Interest
arts.sum: Former Manchester United and Sunderland chief scout Mick Brown has underlined Tino Livramento’s focus going forward. According to Brown, Livramento’s sole focus is on recovering from a knee injury and returning to action for Newcastle United and England, despite continuing noise about interest from Manchester City.
